    Reference

    All functions

    adj_vars()

    Adjust values of copula parameters individually

    cVCopula()

    A faster Vectorized conditional copula function where we don't build redudendant copulas if unique(eta) is small

    causalSamp()

    Sample from a causal model

    get_copula() gaussian_causl_cop() t_causl_cop() emp_causl_cop() sim_cop()

    Copula family functions

    causl_model()

    Define a causl_model object

    check_rej() check_pars()

    Check parameters for univariate families

    dGaussCop() dtCop() dfgmCopula()

    Density of a multivariate copula

    dGaussDiscCop()

    Density of a Mixed Copula

    emp_cdf()

    Empirical CDF

    emp_cop()

    Empirical copula

    ests_ses()

    Extract parameter estimates and standard errors

    is_categorical() is_discrete()

    Check properties of family variables

    family_list()

    Obtain list of family functions

    family_vals familyVals copula_vals

    Numbers for parametric families

    fit_causl() fitCausal()

    Fit multivariate copula regression model

    fit_optim()

    Fit using maximum likelihood estimation

    lhs() `lhs<-`() rhs_vars() tidy_formulas()

    Tools for manipulating formulas

    gen_cop_pars()

    Function to generate random copula parameters for simulation

    gen_dummy_dat()

    Generate a dummy dataset

    get_X_density()

    Get density of treatments

    get_family() gaussian_causl_fam() t_causl_fam() Gamma_causl_fam() binomial_causl_fam() beta_causl_fam() categorical_causl_fam() ordinal_causl_fam()

    Return causl_fam function from integer index

    get_max_weights()

    Get maximum weight for each segment of a distribution

    glm_dens() univarDens()

    Get univariate densities and uniform order statistics

    glm_sim()

    Simulate from a GLM

    insert_lev() rmv_lev()

    Insert/remove extra list level for causl_family objects

    link()

    Obtain link from causl_ objects

    link_apply()

    Helper function to apply link function

    link_setup()

    Set up link functions

    links_cop()

    List of link functions for copuulas

    links_list linksList

    List of links available for each parametric family

    ll_frugal()

    Log-likelihood for frugal parameterization

    merge_formulas()

    Combine multiple formulas

    modify()

    Generic for modify

    modify(<causl_model>)

    Modify causl_model object

    nll2()

    Negative log-likelihood

    pair_copula_setup()

    Sets up copula quantities only

    par_masks()

    Get parameter masks for regression parameters

    print(<causl_model>)

    Display output from causl_model

    process_discrete_dens()

    Obtain univariate densities

    process_family_link()

    New function to sort out links and families simultaneously

    process_inputs() process_formulas() process_family()

    Process formulas, families and parameters

    process_prespecified()

    Obtain quantiles for prespecified variables

    rejectionWeights()

    Get weights for rejection sampling

    rescale_cop() rescaleCop()

    Rescale quantiles to conditional copula

    rescale_var() rescaleVar()

    Rescale quantiles to arbitrary random variable.

    rfrugal() rfrugalParam()

    Sample from a causal model

    rGaussCop() rtCop() rfgmCopula()

    Sample from multivariate copulas

    sandwich_errors()

    Compute robust standard errors

    sim_X()

    Simulate initial X values

    sim_copula() sim_CopVal()

    Simulate copula values

    sim_inversion() sim_multi() sim_rejection()

    Simulate for single time-step

    sim_variable()

    Simulate a single variable using the inversion method

    sim_vinecop()

    Simulate from vine copula

    theta_to_p_ord() theta_to_p_cat()

    Transform categorical or ordinal parameters into probabilities

    var_order()

    Obtain variable ordering from formulas
